entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
